page.title: 07BUS SERVICES APPLETON WISKE
page.content: Appleton Wiske has a United service bus to Northallerton on a Wednesday and Northallerton and Stockton on Saturdays.Return fare is Â£2.00 and was thought expensive.Not many people use the service bus,only 4 out of 55 used it once a week,3 out of 55 used it twice a week.Almost half the people surveyed thought the service bus should run more often,3 or 4 times a week and some thought daily.The village has a Mini_Bus which is run by a committee.The present Mini_Bus is a 15 seat Ford Transit,Use of the Mini_Bus is open to all villagers but only approved persons can drive it.The Mini_Bus is used for shopping and pleasure trips and the Scouts take it to camp.Charges are reasonable,the return fare to Northallerton is about 50p.The charge varies with the number of people using it.Jeremy Peacock.
